## Feature Description
A clear description of what you want to add or improve.

## Problem / Use Case
What problem does this solve?

Example: "As a player, I want to see frame data in training mode so I can learn optimal punishes."

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you'd like the feature to work.

## Technical Considerations
- Does this require new assets?
- Performance concerns?
- Affects frame timing (60 FPS critical)?
- Blocked by other features?
